name: Seamster
description: A tailor specializing in men's garments; adventurers can commission custom clothing, repair travel-worn outfits, or learn about local fashion trends.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the soft scent of fine fabrics and the sound of scissors cutting cloth and needles working through material. The air carries the promise of style and the essential nature of clothing craftsmanship, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of creative tailoring and the importance of proper presentation and fashion.
